description: Advances from a bustling town to a veritable metropolis, full of the wonders of modern technology. This is the Spartan city phase, where Infantry cost 10% less metal but take 10% longer to train.
tooltip: Advance to City Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies. Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius, 40% more garrison capacity and +5 range . Structures +5 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit. Spartans gain 1% faster run walk and cost 20% less metal but take 15% longer to train. Ifantry (Perioikois and Helots not included) gain 1 hack and pierce armor.  Champions 30 more life.
